title: CIDER Women's Summer Cocktail Dress - Tube Ruched Ruffle Mini Dress
description: Size Details: To ensure a flattering and comfortable fit, please refer to the size chart before purchasing. If you're in between sizes, you might consider opting for one size smaller for the best fit due to the stretchy craftsmanship involved

Slightly Sheer and Durable Fabric: The fabric is medium thickness and light color is slightly sheer, providing opacity so you can feel confident when wearing this women's dress. Made of 100% polyester, the fabric of this mini dress is woven to offer a high stretch capacity, providing both comfort and a flattering fit

Flattering Ruched and Ruffle Details: The cocktail dress is crafted with ruched and ruffle design elements that create a flattering silhouette. The gather and flow enhance natural curves, offering both a sophisticated and playful look, ideal for drawing attention in all the right places

High Stretch Comfort: Constructed from a woven material with high stretch, this mini sundress ensures both comfort and ease of movement. Perfect for all-day wear, the fabric accommodates your body’s natural movements while maintaining its shape, offering a relaxed yet stylish fit

Versatile Occasion Wear: Perfect for various events, this summer dresses transitions seamlessly from a casual day out to a chic date night or vacation. The strapless design and ruched details add a touch of elegance, making the mini dress suitable for multiple occasions without compromising on style or comfort
